review: I am very disappointed with the fire TV.  I have Roku and ATT uverse.  I chose to purchase the fire TV because I use amazon for all my purchases.  The device is substandard.  The sound quality is in and out.  The control is hit and miss.  It works perfectly and then it seems to have a mind of its own.  I should have just gone with another Roku.  I use all your AWS services for me and my business so I assumed it would have been tested.  This device is a beta device at best.  You should be have never let it reach market.
author: Jason Cousins

review: We love Amazon Fire T.V. We use an HD antenna for all our local channels, buy some cable shows on Prime and also use Hulu and Netflix. This is the future of TV watching and it has saved us a considerable amount of money overall annually. It was well packaged and arrived on time.
author: Alicia Baker
